pl
Class PersistentObject

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--pl.PersistentObject
public abstract class PersistentObject
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates the behavior needed to make single instances persistent and is the class that business/domain classes inherit from to become persistent.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String TIMESTAMP_FIELD_NAME
